1.title: The Ancestors

episode of.title: America: From the Ground Up! (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: The second season opener follows Monty Dobson on the expedition to uncover the archaeological expedition to uncover the story of the America's Native peoples.

2.title: Worlds Collide

episode of.title: America: From the Ground Up! (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: As the Spanish Empire collapsed around the globe, her old European rivals and an upstart America begin to tear away Spanish lands in America. Join Monty for the expedition to uncover the archaeological story of the fight for a continent.

3.title: The Other Colonial America

episode of.title: America: From the Ground Up! (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Join archaeologist Dr. Monty Dobson on the archaeological expedition to uncover the story of the Europeans and their wars to control America's future.

4.title: Paradise Lost

episode of.title: America: From the Ground Up! (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Join archaeologist Dr. Monty Dobson on the expedition to uncover the archaeological history of the Civil War in the West.

5.title: An Un-Civil War

episode of.title: America: From the Ground Up! (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Joind Dr. Monty Dobson on the expedition to uncover the archaeological history of the Civil War in the West.

6.title: The West

episode of.title: America: From the Ground Up! (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Join Dr. Monty Dobson on the archaeological expedition to uncover the real story of how the West was settled.

1.title: America's Lost Civilization

episode of.title: America: From the Ground Up! (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: In 1100AD Cahokia was three times the size of Paris or London and the spiritual and political home of an urban civilization that stretched from the Great Lakes to the Gulf of Mexico. Join Monty as he digs into the archaeology to the secret history of a civilization that de Soto discovered while exploring America in the 1500's.

2.title: The Fur Trade

episode of.title: America: From the Ground Up! (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: The Europeans reveals the hidden history of the Fur Trade on America's colonial frontier.

3.title: World War America

episode of.title: America: From the Ground Up! (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: The archaeological history of the French Indian War is explored.

4.title: Revolution

episode of.title: America: From the Ground Up! (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: But the archaeology of the Revolution tells us a different story: the war for America's frontier. From the siege of Quebec to Benedict Arnold's defeat on Lake Champlain: Monty explores the hidden history of America's first war for independence.

5.title: The Science of Archaeology

episode of.title: America: From the Ground Up! (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: In episode five, Monty explores The Science of Archaeology. Monty interviews some of America's most renown archaeologists and uses demonstrations of the tools and techniques they use to uncover the past. From 3D underwater sonar mapping of shipwrecks on the Great Lakes to using ground penetrating radar and magnetic imaging to map Native American sites, Monty explores the fascinating science of archaeology beyond the point of a trowel. Archaeology: where history meets science in the dirt!

6.title: War of 1812

episode of.title: America: From the Ground Up! (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Join Monty as he explores the shipwrecks and forts that testify to the secret history of the struggle for supremacy on the frontier. From New Orleans to Quebec and From Mackinaw Island to Vermont, episode features recreated battle of Put in Bay with more than 19 tall ships and underwater archaeology on Lake Champlain.

imdb.plot outline: Join Dr. Monty Dobson on the expedition to uncover America's archaeological history. The series follows Monty as he explores archaeological sites along America's ever shifting frontier and uses these sites as touch points to tell America's story. From the first peoples who arrived during the last Ice Age to the archaeology of the Industrial Age, America from the Ground Up. is history like you've never seen it before.
imdb.title: America: From the Ground Up!
akas: America: From the Ground Up! (United States)
plot: Join Dr. Monty Dobson on the expedition to uncover America's archaeological history. The series follows Monty as he explores archaeological sites along America's ever shifting frontier and uses these sites as touch points to tell America's story. From the first peoples who arrived during the last Ice Age to the archaeology of the Industrial Age, America from the Ground Up. is history like you've never seen it before.::Monty Dobson
